Research Software Engineer at the Netherlands eScience Center based in Amsterdam. Working on natural language processing and machine learning in the digital humanities and social sciences. Graduated from the Research Master's Psychology at the University of Amsterdam with a focus on methodology and statistics. Formerly contributing to the open science software JASP. My interests are applied (Bayesian) statistics, machine learning, and programming in research (R and Python). Open science advocate and enthusiastic piano player.
